name: RJ Salvador
subtitle: Software Engineer
objective: I'm seeking software engineering roles that leverage my tech experience while making use of my skills in architecture tech and creative fields. I've been working in tech since 2014 with a strong focus on the front-end, UI and UX, data visualization, and 2D/3D modelling.
skills_qualifications:
_**Experienced with several software platforms and frameworks.**_  
Having worked in front-end roles (React, Ember), full-stack roles (J2EE, .NET, Python), and some cloud work (Azure). Accustomed to navigating complex codebases and learning unfamiliar tools quickly.

_**Proficient at implementing UI designs to spec and solving UX problems.**_  
Has a strong understanding of design processes (Figma, Illustrator, Storybook), and design systems.

_**Has direct experience from all over the software development lifecycle.**_  
From kickoff, to delivery, to maintenance. Has leveraged that experience to assess feasibility and help plan project roadmaps.
about: When I'm away from work, I'm usually playing music (guitar/choir/cello), hanging out at a climbing gym, or being active in church.
